Mosquito-0.1.0.0: A stateless LCF-style implementation of higher-order logic in Haskell.

Safe HaskellNone

Mosquito.ProofState.ProofState

Description

The Mosquito proof state for tracking the current state during a backwards (tactic-oriented) proof. Functions for making an initial conjecture, applying pretactics to a proof state, and for retrieving a theorem from a complete backwards proof.
